issues.description: Hero CTA placement may not be visible above fold on mobile with 2-column layout
issues.rationale: 60/40 desktop split could stack poorly on mobile, burying primary CTA below fold

issues.description: Sticky CTA appears at 40% scroll but hides at pricing - creates conversion gap
issues.rationale: Users lose CTA access during critical pricing evaluation phase

issues.description: Pricing cards lack comparison clarity without side-by-side feature matrix
issues.rationale: Accordion comparison table adds friction when users need quick tier differentiation

issues.description: Risk reversal block placement under pricing may feel disconnected from CTAs
issues.rationale: 48px gap between pricing CTAs and guarantees reduces trust reinforcement impact

issues.description: How It Works stepper may not clearly show post-signup value realization timeline
issues.rationale: 3-step process unclear if it covers setup only or includes ongoing platform benefits

issues.description: Hero headline lacks specific value proposition beyond speed claim
issues.rationale: 48 hours promise without context of what business type or complexity level

issues.description: Primary CTA button 16px padding may feel cramped on mobile tap targets
issues.rationale: Minimum 44px touch target height needed for comfortable mobile interaction

issues.description: Proof chips 80px spacing could create visual disconnection from CTAs
issues.rationale: Wide spacing reduces perceived relationship between trust signals and actions

issues.description: Card border-radius 8px may feel inconsistent with chip 12px padding roundness
issues.rationale: Mixed radius values create subtle visual tension in component hierarchy

issues.description: Audit log card format may lack urgency indicators for time-sensitive actions
issues.rationale: Static card presentation doesn't convey real-time business activity momentum

suggestedFixes.fix: Use single-column mobile stack with CTA positioned max 320px from top, test 70/30 desktop split
suggestedFixes.rationale: Ensures CTA visibility above fold on all devices while maintaining desktop clarity

suggestedFixes.fix: Keep sticky CTA visible throughout pricing section, only hide on final confirmation page
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains conversion path during critical decision phase

suggestedFixes.fix: Add quick comparison row above cards showing 3 key differentiators in 24px text
suggestedFixes.rationale: Enables fast tier scanning without requiring accordion interaction

suggestedFixes.fix: Integrate guarantee text directly into pricing card footers with 12px padding
suggestedFixes.rationale: Creates immediate trust association with purchase decision point

suggestedFixes.fix: Add timeline indicators showing Day 1, Day 2, Week 1 outcomes in stepper progression
suggestedFixes.rationale: Clarifies value realization schedule and sets realistic expectations

suggestedFixes.fix: Expand to 'Launch Your [Business Type] in 48 Hours' with dynamic business selector
suggestedFixes.rationale: Personalizes promise and increases relevance for specific user segments

suggestedFixes.fix: Increase primary button padding to 20px vertical, 24px horizontal for 48px min height
suggestedFixes.rationale: Meets mobile accessibility standards while maintaining desktop proportions

suggestedFixes.fix: Reduce chip spacing to 40px and align directly under CTA with 16px top margin
suggestedFixes.rationale: Strengthens visual connection between trust signals and conversion actions

suggestedFixes.fix: Standardize all component radius to 12px to match chip padding for visual consistency
suggestedFixes.rationale: Creates cohesive design language across all interface elements

suggestedFixes.fix: Add pulse animation and 'Live' indicator to recent audit entries with 2px accent border
suggestedFixes.rationale: Conveys real-time activity and business momentum to increase urgency
